import React from 'react' import { Container, AppBar, Typography, Grow, Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import memories from './images/memories.png' import Posts from './components/Posts/Posts' import Form from './components/Form/Form' import useStyles from './styles' const App = () => { const classes = useStyles() return ( Memories {/* 该组件用来生成一些简单的过渡动画。in表示显示该组件 */}
) } export default App
